text: Ever wondered why local storage might not be the best choice for transactions in web apps?
it's not fit for complex operations due to its synchronous nature,
which can freeze UIs and lead to unreliable transactions.
Modern alternatives like IndexedDB and LocalForage
provide asynchronous, scalable, and safer storage options.
They support transactions without blocking the main thread,
ensuring faster performance and improved data integrity for your applications.
